mapper.select: SELECT RPAD(SUBSTR(member_id, 1, 3), LENGTH(member_id), '*') memberId, RPAD(SUBSTR(member_passwd, 1, 3), LENGTH(member_passwd), '*') memberPasswd, member_name memberName, RPAD(SUBSTR(member_phone, 1, 7), LENGTH(member_phone), '*') memberPhone, member_email memberEmail, member_addr1 memberAddr1, member_addr2 memberAddr2, member_addr3 memberAddr3, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(member_regdate, 'YY/MM/DD'), 'YYYY/MM/DD') memberRegdate, member_state memberState FROM member ORDER BY member_regdate DESC
